item.title: King & Butler & Servant (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
The King

Royal Finger (Day) - Immediately put someone on trial. (1 use)

Decide Fate (Day) - Immediately decide the outcome of the current trial. (1 use)

üó™ Conspire (Night) - Talk privately with a player. (Infinite uses)

To Your Health! (Night) - Toast the Butler and drink a chalice of choice wine. Specifically, their choice of wine. (Infinite uses)

The Butler

Invigorating Wine (Day) - Grant The King death immunity, if he chooses to partake. (3 uses)

Poisoned Wine (Day) - Kill The King, if he is so foolish as to partake. (1 use)

Serve Wine (Night) - Occupy a player tonight with wine. Cannot target the same player 2 nights in a row. (Infinite uses)

Concentrated Wine (Night) - Throw a party, occupying everyone that targets you. (2 uses)

The Servant

Intoxicating Wine (Day) - Render The King so drunk that he is unable to use his day abilities, if he chooses to drink up. (3 uses)

Poisoned Wine (Day) - Kill The King, if he is so foolish as to partake. (1 use)

Serve Wine (Night) - Occupy a player tonight with wine. Cannot target the same player 2 nights in a row. (Infinite uses)

Concentrated Wine (Night) - Throw a party, occupying everyone that targets you. (2 uses)
